name.description: The name of the property, e.g. for display purposes. The string is UTF-8 encoded.

description.description: The description of the property. The string is UTF-8 encoded.

type.description: The property type. A `type` is either a basic type used for `componentType` or an `ARRAY`. If `ARRAY` is used, then `componentType` must also be specified. `ARRAY` is a fixed-length array when `componentCount` is defined, and variable-length otherwise.

componentType.description: When `type` is `ARRAY` this indicates the type of each component of the array.

componentCount.description: The number of components per element for `ARRAY` elements.

normalized.description: Specifies whether integer values are normalized. This applies both when `type` is an integer type, or when `type` is `ARRAY` with a `componentType` that is an integer type. For unsigned integer types, values are normalized between [0, 1]. For signed integer types, values are normalized between [-1, 1]. For all other types, this property is ignored.

max.description: Maximum allowed values for property values. Only applicable for fixed-size numeric element types (integer, floats and `ARRAY`s thereof). Both `min` and `max` arrays have the same length. When `type` is `ARRAY` the length is determined by `componentCount`; otherwise the length is 1. `normalized` property has no effect on array values: they always correspond to the integer values.

min.description: Minimum allowed values for property values. Only applicable for fixed-size numeric element types (integer, floats and `ARRAY`s thereof). Both `min` and `max` arrays have the same length. When `type` is `ARRAY` the length is determined by `componentCount`; otherwise the length is 1. `normalized` property has no effect on array values: they always correspond to the integer values.

default.description: A default value to use when the property value is not defined. If used, `optional` must be set to true. The type of the value must match the property type (e.g. for a `STRING`, use a JSON string. For an integer or floating point number, use a JSON number. For an `ARRAY` use a JSON array containing values matching the `componentType`).

optional.description: If true, this property is optional.
